description: Mixins and CSS for applying table styles
name: d2l-table

scripts.test: concurrently -p name -n lint,polymer:test "npm run lint" "npm run test:galen:local" "polymer test --skip-plugin sauce"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:wc && npm run lint:js
scripts.dump:galen:local:run: npm run galen -- dump table.test.js -g factory:local -d test/acceptance/dumps
scripts.galen:local:run: npm run galen -- test table.test.js -g factory:local -- -p8
scripts.galen:sauce:run: sc-run -- npm run galen -- test table.test.js -g factory:sauce -i SAUCE_USERNAME SAUCE_ACCESS_KEY TRAVIS_REPO_SLUG TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER -- -p8
scripts.dump:galen:local: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve -p 8080" "npm run dump:galen:local:run"
scripts.test:galen:local: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve -p 8080" "npm run galen:local:run"
scripts.test:galen:sauce: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve -p 8080" "npm run galen:sauce:run"

author: D2L Corporation
